nodes.text: Marvel Omnibus is an imprint by Marvel Comics used to reprint large quantities of comics in hardcover collections. Marvel Omnibuses differ from both Epic Collections and  Dark Horse Omnibuses in that they collect more issues per book and use a larger page size. Marvel Omnibuses can simply be the equivalent of 2 or 3 Epic Collections that have been republished as a single book. It is unknown whether Marvel Omnibuses will republish Legends comics as comprehensively as the Epic Collections.
Included in this section are Omnibuses that collect Canon issues originally published by Marvel Comics.
Included in this section are Omnibuses that collect Legends issues originally published by Marvel Comics.
Included in this section are Omnibuses that collect Legends issues originally published by Dark Horse Comics.
